metadata.title: CVE-2024-0745 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
The WebAudio `OscillatorNode` object was susceptible to a stack bufferoverflow. This could have led to a potentially exploitable crash. Thisvulnerability affects Firefox < 122.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-0745` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

firefox - 122.0+build2-0ubuntu0.20.04.1
firefox-geckodriver - 122.0+build2-0ubuntu0.20.04.1
firefox-mozsymbols - 122.0+build2-0ubuntu0.20.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: firefox package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '122.0+build2-0ubuntu0.20.04.1').
mozjs52 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
mozjs68 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
